tool.name: ecomet_import_maf
tool.description: Import MAF file from the MTBLS study
tool.help:
========================= Eco-Metabolomics workflow =========================
This is the computational workflow to study the seasonal variation of secondary metabolites in nine different bryophytes.
Module | Import MAF |
Description | Import MAF file |
----- Input -----
Input Preprocess Rdata | Rdata file from the preparations module |
Input study MAF | Metabolights Assignment file containing the feature matrix |
------ Output ------
Preprocess Rdata | Rdata file. Please connect this Rdata file to the ecological characteristics module of the MTBLS520 workflow. |
---------------------------------------------------
.. class:: infomark
**Authors**
For updates and documentation, please visit **https://github.com/korseby/container-mtbls520** or contact **Kristian Peters (kpeters@ipb-halle.de)**.
